instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Prick the potatoes with a fork and bake for 1-1¼ hours or until tender inside. Allow to cool.

Scoop out the flesh of the potatoes into a large bowl and mash well with a fork until smooth. Mix in the butter, cheeses, and all but 1 tbsp chives, season well. Stir in the flour and mix until well incorporated. Divide into 4.
On a lightly floured surface, roll out each quarter into a 16cm round and cut into 4 triangles. Repeat with the remaining dough.
Heat a little oil in a large frying pan and fry the farls in batches, for 1 minute on each side or until golden. Serve sprinkled with the remaining chives sprinkled over.
